keyMoments.title: Barrier Power Revealed
keyMoments.description: Bartolomeo reveals his Bari Bari no Mi ability by creating an impenetrable barrier that completely withstands Elizabello's King Punch.
keyMoments.significance: First reveal of the Barrier-Barrier Fruit in the anime, explaining Bartolomeo's invincibility throughout the tournament.

keyMoments.title: Offensive Barrier Application
keyMoments.description: Bartolomeo demonstrates that his barriers can be weaponized by launching a Barrier Crash attack at Elizabello II.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the versatility of the fruit, proving it's not just defensive but also offensive.

abilities.description: Creates transparent, impenetrable barriers by crossing fingers. The barriers can withstand even the most powerful attacks, including the King Punch.
abilities.limitations: User must cross their fingers to activate. The extent of the barrier's size and duration limits are not fully revealed in this episode.

abilities.description: Launches a barrier at high speed to smash into enemies, powerful enough to injure and defeat strong opponents like Elizabello II.

userHistory.notes: Bartolomeo is the current user of the Bari Bari no Mi, though the exact episode when he consumed it is not shown.

reveals.information: Allows user to create impenetrable barriers by crossing fingers
Barriers can be weaponized and launched as offensive attacks
Barriers are strong enough to withstand a King Punch, an attack said to be capable of defeating a Yonko
